//Generated by BehavEd


affect ( "talker1", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ FLUSH )
{
	set ( "SET_VIEWDIST", 768.000 );
	set ( "SET_RELEASE_ONCONTACT", "ON" );
	set ( "SET_ANIM_SEQUENCER", "OFF" );
	set ( "SET_STRING_PACKAGE", "KAM4" );

	task ( "line1" )
	{
		set ( "SET_ANIM", "Body|Script|Full+None+Normal+Stand|Subtle Talk" );
		sound ( /*@CHANNELS*/ CHAN_VOICE, "sound/npc/kam4/guard01/01explosives.mp3" );
		set ( "SET_PRINT_TOKEN", "KAM4_001" );
	}

	dowait ( "line1" );

	affect ( "talker2", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ FLUSH )
	{
		set ( "SET_RELEASE_ONCONTACT", "ON" );
		set ( "SET_ANIM_SEQUENCER", "OFF" );
		set ( "SET_VIEWDIST", 768.000 );

		task ( "line2" )
		{
			sound ( /*@CHANNELS*/ CHAN_VOICE, "sound/npc/kam4/guard02/01trains.mp3" );
			set ( "SET_ANIM", "Body|Script|Full+None+Normal+Stand|Subtle Talk" );
			set ( "SET_PRINT_TOKEN", "KAM4_002" );
		}

		dowait ( "line2" );

		affect ( "talker1", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ FLUSH )
		{

			task ( "line3" )
			{
				sound ( /*@CHANNELS*/ CHAN_VOICE, "sound/npc/kam4/guard01/02toocold.mp3" );
				set ( "SET_ANIM", "Body|Script|Full+None+Normal+Stand|Subtle Talk" );
				set ( "SET_PRINT_TOKEN", "KAM4_003" );
			}

			dowait ( "line3" );

			affect ( "talker1", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ FLUSH )
			{
				set ( "SET_ANIM_SEQUENCER", "ON" );
				set ( "SET_STATIONARY", "OFF" );
				set ( "SET_VIEWDIST", 2000.000 );

				task ( "talker one walk" )
				{
					set ( "SET_TASK", "Path" );
					set ( /*@SET_TYPES*/ "SET_NAVGOAL", "talker1_spot" );
				}

				dowait ( "talker one walk" );
				use ( "intro_door_walker" );
			}


			affect ( "talker2", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ FLUSH )
			{
				set ( "SET_ANIM_SEQUENCER", "ON" );
				set ( "SET_STATIONARY", "OFF" );
				set ( "SET_VIEWDIST", 2000.000 );

				task ( "talker two walk" )
				{
					set ( "SET_TASK", "Path" );
					set ( /*@SET_TYPES*/ "SET_NAVGOAL", "talker2_spot" );
				}

				dowait ( "talker two walk" );
			}

		}

	}

}
